means: 普罗维登斯（美国罗得岛州的首府）

sentence.Network_en: These women regard his death as an act of providence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些女人认为他的死乃是天意。

sentence.Network_en: How far is Pawtucket from Providence?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 其实天意(Providence)的设计颇似超级狮人凤, 两者均有大剑及大枪)振翅!! 呢只野真系好重, 虽然胶成份比合金成份高很多, 但由于主体.
首府普罗维登斯（Providence）位于湾头，是州内最大的都市和最大的港口。普罗维登斯是美国最早的工业化城市之一，十九世纪早 …
天命（providence）和谕旨（decrees）有什么不同？现在言归正传。
首都普洛威顿斯(Providence)是由罗杰‧威廉斯牧师(minister Roger Williams)所建立的城市，当初他开放的神学在麻萨诸塞州被禁止后 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin providentia, from providere 'foresee, attend to' (see provide)

encyclopedia.content: ZAFT军的新锐试作机，由劳·卢·克鲁泽驾驶，机体名称里的“providence”是“神意、天命”的意思。从技术角度来看，天命高达堪称是集先前的几架高达之大成的机体，无论是机体性能还是火力，在当时的MS中都可以说是数一数二。武器方面，本机最大的特征是背部背包内所装备的两种类型的可进行远距离全方位攻击的龙骑兵，另外还可使用MA-M221型光束步枪、76mmMMI-GAU2近接防御机关炮以及内藏了大型光束军刀和光束枪的MA-MV05A复合兵装防盾系统，攻击的方式相当丰富。天命高达在先后与强袭高达和自由高达激战后，被“创世”击毁。

entry.def: Providence is God, or a force which is believed by some people to arrange the things that happen to us.

example.ex: The first Slav pope, John Paul, said that providence had chosen him to proclaim the spiritual unity of Europe...
example.tran: 第一位斯拉夫教皇约翰·保罗声称上天选择了他来昭示欧洲的精神统一。

example.ex: These women regard his death as an act of providence.
example.tran: 这些女人认为他的死乃是天意。

means.word_mean: 1. the guardianship and control exercised by a deity;
2. a manifestation of God's foresightful care for His creatures
3. the prudence and care exercised by someone in the management of resources

auth_sentence.content: Accept the place divine providence has found for you.
auth_sentence.res_content: Accept the place divine providence has found for you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Accept the place divine providence has found for you.

auth_sentence.content: Nor was this the only mulct which Providence exacted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor was this the only mulct which Providence exacted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor was this the only mulct which Providence exacted.

auth_sentence.content: Rather he will ultimately receive the blessing of Providence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rather he will ultimately receive the blessing of Providence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rather he will ultimately receive the blessing of Providence.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的
e出+vid看,查+ent……的→看出来了→明显的
im不+provident[adj.顾及未来的,有远见的]→adj.不顾将来的,不节俭的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惹人反感的,招人嫉妒的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+vid看,查+ious……的→看上去不好的→有害的
pro向前+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
provide预备,提供+ed→在……前提之下→倘若

stems_affixes.value_cn: 红利,股息;回报,效益;被除数,划分
stems_affixes.word_buile: divide[v.分开]+end→划分,区分[红利,股息也是划分出去的]
in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明显;显著;根据;证据;迹象
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+vid看,查+ence表名词→看出来了→明显
pro向前+vid看+ency表名词→向前看→有远见

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电视, 录象, 视频
stems_affixes.word_buile: vid看,查+eo→n.电视, 录象, 视频

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,供给,准备,预防,规定
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vid看,查+e→提前看好→预备,提供

sentences.en: To act as you have done is to fly in the face of Providence.
sentences.cn: 照你的所作所为那样去行事,是违背上帝的意志的。

sentences.en: ‘I don’t think I’ll insure my boat.’ ‘Don’t tempt providence. It’s best to insure it.’
sentences.cn: “我不想给我的船上保险。”“别冒险了，最好还是上吧。”
